resources.string:
Stegdroid is an image steganography app developed by Francisco Martiarena.

To hide a message just click the "HIDE" button, select an image with a size smaller than 2500px (either width or height), write your message and click the "SAVE" button.

Your new image will be saved in the phone's image gallery in a folder called "Stegdroid"
 ---
To get the hidden message from an image just click the "DECODE" button, select the image and click the "DECODE" button again.

If you want to edit the file just click the "EDIT" button.
